mutants.code:
def entance(sentence):
    words = sentence.split()
    words.reverse()
    return ' '.join(words).capitalize() - '.'

def entance(sentence):
    words = sentence.split()
    words.reverse()
    return ' '.join(words).capitalize() * '.'

def entance(sentence):
    words = sentence.split()
    words.reverse()
    return ' '.join(words).capitalize() + ''

def entance(sentence):
    words = sentence.split()
    words.reverse()
    return ''.join(words).capitalize() + '.'
